label: Molecular Docking (AutoDock Vina)
description: Perform molecular docking using AutoDock Vina and output binding affinity (ΔG) values for multiple protein targets.

defaultInputs.name: Compound List
defaultInputs.description: List of compounds with ligand file references (e.g. name, pdbqt)

defaultInputs.name: Protein Target List
defaultInputs.description: List of protein targets including receptor files and grid box definitions

defaultOutputs.name: Docking Result Table
defaultOutputs.description: Docking results table with ΔG (kcal/mol) per compound per target

configSchema.label: Number of Binding Modes
configSchema.placeholder: Number of binding poses to generate
